Description: Sultry, dramatic, and stylish are just three words to describe this gown. It is floor length with a small train and the A-line silhouette slims any body type. The bodice is detailed with a corded applique and sequin sparkle. Sheer back cover adds a sense of romance to the style. Ready for a night out.
